comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Here's an interesting comparison photograph from almost the same position at the State Library of NSW: libapp.sl.nsw.gov.au/cgi-bin/spydus/FULL/PM/BSEARCH/2345/... There, the photograph taken a few years earlier than this Kerry image is titled "Hyde Park Band Day". Looks like a very similar event.

comment._content: See my comments at www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2780553442/ I think this is the (?current) link for the SLNSW pic BM mentions above - acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemLarge.aspx?itemID=413408 ...this SLNSW pic also shows the gas lamp
